basics.name: Xiaoxiao Qi

basics.summary: Technical engineer in progammatic Ads optimization, machine learning, data engineering, statistical modeling, signal processing, computer vision and control theory. Holds a Ph.D. in Biomedical Engineering with a focus on Neuroimaging data resource development.
